text:
For a server install with CATALINA_BASE different that CATALINA_HOME remote 
debugging is not working. If the webapp is installed on the server with 
CATALINA_BASE same as CATALINA_HOME it works fine.
creator: gmagheru@hotmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
This works for me. My best guess is you have something wrong in your debugging
configuration. Please use the Tomcat users list if you still require help
getting this set up correctly.
